techs.name: HTML
techs.description: HyperText Markup Language, is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.

techs.name: CSS
techs.description: Cascading Style Sheets, is a style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in a markup language such as HTML.

techs.name: JavaScript
techs.description: JavaScript is a programming language that is one of the core technologies of the World Wide Web, alongside HTML and CSS.

techs.name: Git
techs.description: Git is software for tracking changes in any set of files, usually used for coordinating work among programmers collaboratively developing source code during software development.

techs.name: ReactJS
techs.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces based on UI components.

techs.name: Redux
techs.description: Redux é uma biblioteca JavaScript de código aberto para gerenciar o estado do aplicativo. É mais comumente usado com a lib React.

techs.name: TypeScript
techs.description: TypeScript s a strict syntactical superset of JavaScript and adds optional static typing to the language.

techs.name: Styled Components
techs.description: Styled Components, is a CSS-in-JS styling framework that uses tagged template literals in JavaScript and the power of CSS.

techs.name: SASS
techs.description: Syntactically Awesome Style Sheets, is a preprocessor scripting language that is interpreted or compiled into CSS.

techs.name: GSAP
techs.description: GreenSock Animation Platform, is a animation library JavaScript and animates anything JavaScript can touch.

techs.name: Next.js
techs.description: Next.js is a framework built on top of Node.js enabling React based web applications functionalities such as SSR and SSG websites.

techs.name: Framer Motion
techs.description: Framer Motion, is a new open source, production-ready motion library for React on the web.

techs.name: Node.js
techs.description: Node.js, is a back-end JavaScript runtime environment that runs on the V8 engine and executes JavaScript code outside a web browser.

techs.name: Express.js
techs.description: Express.js, is a back end web application framework for Node.js.

techs.name: MongoDB
techs.description: MongoDB, is a database program. Classified as a NoSQL database program.

techs.name: PostgreSQL
techs.description: PostgreSQL, is a free and open-source relational database management system emphasizing extensibility and SQL compliance.

techs.name: Firebase
techs.description: Firebase, is a platform developed by Google for creating mobile and web applications.

techs.name: GraphQL
techs.description: GraphQL, is an open-source data query and manipulation language for APIs, and a runtime for fulfilling queries with existing data.

techs.name: Webpack
techs.description: Webpack, is an open-source JavaScript module bundler.

techs.name: Tailwind
techs.description: Tailwind, is a utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom user interfaces.

techs.name: ChakraUI
techs.description: Chakra, is a simple, modular and accessible component library that gives you the building blocks you need to build your React applications.

portfolios.name: Pomo.react
portfolios.description: Pomo.react, baseado na técnica pomodoro, consiste em ser uma técnica de foco por durante 25 minutos, e 5 minutos de pausa. Construido em react.js.

portfolios.name: WMDB
portfolios.description: WMDB, inspirado no TMDB e IMDB, consiste em ser um banco de filmes e séries. Construido em react, next.js, sass e consumo de APIs, ainda em desenvolvimento

portfolios.name: Links
portfolios.description: Links, inspirado na plataforma Linktree, permitindo ao usuário agrupar e divulgar todos os links de suas redes sociais. Construido em react.js, next.js e framer motion.

portfolios.name: Healthy Food
portfolios.description: Healthy Food, é um projeto desenvolvido simulando uma landing page. Construido com react, styled components, next.js e responsivo

portfolios.name: Corebiz E-commerce
portfolios.description: Corebiz E-commerce, é um teste front-end desenvolvido simulando um e-commerce. Construido com react e styled components
